{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WGA11B |revision= |upc=735858169035 |ean= |asin=B0000AJVBW |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=06/20/2003 |manuf_country= |manuf=CyberTAN |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=bridge |fcc_id=Q87-WGA11BV1 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ubicom |cpu1_model=IP2022 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Agere |wi1_chip1_model=WL600101LY |wi1_chip2_brand=Agere |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=10M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=linksys 1-11 |default_ssid_regex=^linksys ([1-9]{1}@@@10@@@11)$ |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:13:10 |oui_eth= }} ''Wireless-B Game Adapter''
{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=WGA11B}} "3751-03100011" is silkscreened on the board. The device uses the ad-hoc network '''linksys''' followed by a space and then the channel number when set to an individual channel (1-11).
When set to In mode, the device connects to an open network.
Using a network with WEP or with SSID broadcast disabled (P1, P2, P3 [profile] modes) requires the device to be pre-configured using Linksys' utility. ==Images== File:Linksys WGA11B board top.jpg|board top File:Linksys WGA11B board bot.jpg|board bottom [[Has images::internal| ]]
